Package gitlet

Class Blob

java.lang.Object
gitlet.Blob
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Blob extends Object implements Serializable
Blob class that represents a file, including the file's name, the file's contents, and the SHA-1 hash of the file.
See Also:

    • exportBlob

      public static void exportBlob(Blob blob)
      Writes the blob, BLOB, into its corresponding file. Creates a new file for the blob if one does not already exist.

    • importBlob

      public static Blob importBlob(String hash)
      Returns a Blob object with specified SHA-1 HASH.
